original_text: All the men of Ai were called to pursue them, and they pursued Joshua and were lured away from the city.
korean_text: 그 성읍에 있는 모든 백성이 그들을 추격하려고 모여 여호수아를 추격하며 유인함을 받아 아이 성읍을 멀리 떠나니

sentences.original_text: All the men of Ai were called to pursue them
sentences.korean_translation: 아이 모든 사람들은 그들을 추격하라고 불렸습니다

sentences.original_text: and were lured away from the city
